title: Maypretec
subtitle: Full Stack Developer
paragraphs: My role involves building complete digital solutions that function smoothly on both the client and server sides. This versatility allows me to contribute to a wide range of projects and collaborate effectively with different teams.

I specialize in creating mobile applications and responsive web pages that are optimized for performance and usability across different devices and platforms. My work also includes developing more complex web applications, ERP systems, CMS platforms, and CRM solutions designed to the needs of each client. I manage everything from the server-side logic and APIs to database architecture and user interface design, helping organizations streamline their workflows and improve efficiency through custom digital tools.

Additionally, Iâ€™ve had the opportunity to work on projects involving virtual and augmented reality (AR) design, where I helped create immersive experiences for interactive tours and product showcases.
